colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I GDUNG BRGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA DAD PA DANG 'BYOR BA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG GI SRAS BU DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA TSE RING RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU BSDUS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI SPRANYDZ'AS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD YONGS KU SHR'I CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA nI PRANYDZ'A,
